live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
40486.summary: Some customers near the Kalala Organic Estate Winery in West Kelowna are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
40486.title: August 11 - West Kelowna (Kalala Organic Estate Winery) l All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
